attributes.action: introduce a compulsory bicycle registration (number plate) system for machines used on public roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the standard of behaviour amongst the cycling fraternity plummets the level of danger to other road users increases. At present there is no practical method of reporting offending cyclists to the police. If a number plate was carried on the machine the problem would be solved.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
